content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains sexual themes centered around BDSM (Bondage, Discipline, Sado-Masochism), such as bondage, perils and non-consensual plays.

This is a work of fiction where every character pictured is over 20 years old. Any ressemblence with real people would be purely coincidental.

Some of the scenarios are dangerous, and not to be reproduced in any way. If you wish to practice, please do it safely.
